payload.feedback:
Validation failed: Query validation failed: Validation failed due to error: Working outside of application context.

This typically means that you attempted to use functionality that needed
the current application. To solve this, set up an application context
with app.app_context(). See the documentation for more information.
payload.sql:
SELECT c.Key, c.Name, COUNT(p.Key) AS ProductCount
FROM main.customer AS c
JOIN main.product AS p ON c.Key = p.ParentId
GROUP BY c.Key, c.Name
HAVING COUNT(p.Key) > 5
ORDER BY ProductCount DESC
LIMIT 10;
